bio.Recent_Position: Equity Rotational Summer Analyst @ Wells Fargo
bio.Involvements: MBA Program, Antreprenuer Center, FBLA, SBA, MUSA
bio.Bios: Hello! My name is David, and I initiated fall quarter of my freshman year with the Alpha Xi class! In my free time, you will find me hooping at the arc, listening to music or exploring Socal. A fun fact about me is that I am fluent in Spanish. Ask me about my favorite music artists and foods at recruitment, I look forward to meeting you!
